title: 怎么才算合格帖子
author: Qiuini
txt_content:
“撞车”这词也不知道是谁发明的。。

指的是同一个作品被不同的人发布了多次
我标题都不同

replies.author: Qiuini
replies.txt_content:
标题: 怎么才算合格帖子合格吗？为什么被删了有什么错了请告诉。
以下是帖子:
 

KillerMoney官方介绍:
SpigotMC:
Giving or chargeing a player by either a fix amount of money, or random between a max and minimum amount when they kill an entityCharging the victim of a PVPFully customisable loot dropping when an entity dieRunning a command of your choice when an entity dieBanning the ability to farm entities for money,if they were spawned by either eggs or spawnersMultiworld support for entitiesFull modularity, the only thing you need to add to the config file is what you need!Customisable messages, different languages supportedPermission support by each entity for a perfect rank systemMoney multiplier permission - killermoney.multiplier.1...10In both Minecraft and Cauldron server installed modifications, entities are supportedPublic API
Bukkit:
Giving or charging a player by either a fix amount of money, or random between a max and minimum amount when they kill an entityCharging the victim of a PVPFully customisable loot dropping when an entity dieRunning a command of your choice when an entity dieBanning the ability to farm entities for money,if they were spawned by either eggs or spawnersMultiworld support for entitiesFull modularity, the only thing you need to add to the config file is what you need!Customisable messages, different languages supportedPermission support by each entity for a perfect rank systemMoney multiplier permission - killermoney.multiplier.xIn both Minecraft and Cauldron server installed modifications, entities are supportedPublic API
原地址:
SpigotMC:https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/killermoney.485/
Bukkit:https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/killermoney
————————————————————
(版本为v3.4)[英文]官方下载:点击下载
(版本为v3.4)[中文]百度下载:点击下载
(版本为v3.4)单个汉化文本:点击下载
————————————————————
本插件需要Vault前置:点击下载
能使用/money之类的指令就可以了
————————————————————
功能:玩家击杀实体时可设置获得金钱和扣除金钱

————————————————————
指令和权限:
指令:/killermoney help - 帮助界面/killermoney info - 信息界面/killermoney reload - 重新加载————————————————————权限:killermoney.admin - 能使用/killermoney reload 指令killermoney.multiplier.X - Bukkit官方Money multiplier permission ( for example: killermoney.multiplier.100 -> money * 100! )killermoney.multiplier.1...10 - SpigotMC官方Money multiplier permission ( minimum 1, maximum 10 )
————————————————————
这个插件也有人搬运过了:
apai991搬运的

huangyuehao008搬运的

漠然丶淡然搬运的
